document.docAuthor: Nunes, Luis Gabriel de O. A., Nunes, Rafael V. & Vaz-De, Fernando Z.
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic revision of the South American subgenus Canthon (Peltecanthon) Pereira, 1953 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae: Deltochilini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomic revision of the South American subgenus Canthon (Peltecanthon) Pereira, 1953 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae: Deltochilini)

mods:name.mods:namePart: Nunes, Luis Gabriel de O. A.

figureCitation.captionText-0: Fig. 1. Canthon (Peltecanthon) staigi (Pereira, 1953), ♂, São Paulo, Bertioga (CEMT). A. Dorsal habitus. B. Ventral surface of meso- and metafemora. C. Transverse carina in the hypomeron. D. Carina in the margin between pygidium and propygidium. E. Male protibial spur. F. Female protibial spur, São Paulo, Caraguatatuba, P.E. Serra do Mar (CEMT).
figureCitation.captionText-1: Fig. 2. Canthon (Peltecanthon) staigi (Pereira, 1953), ♂, Rio de Janeiro, Restinga da Marambaia (CEMT). A. Parameres lateral view. B. Parameres dorsal view. C. Internal sac ventral view. D. Internal sac dorsal view. Abbreviations: see Material and methods.

caption.paragraph:
Fig. 1.
Canthon ( Peltecanthon ) staigi ( Pereira, 1953 )
, ♂, São Paulo, Bertioga (CEMT). A . Dorsal habitus. B . Ventral surface of meso- and metafemora. C . Transverse carina in the hypomeron. D . Carina in the margin between pygidium and propygidium. E . Male protibial spur. F . Female protibial spur, São Paulo, Caraguatatuba, P.E. Serra do Mar (CEMT).

Fig. 2.
Canthon ( Peltecanthon ) staigi ( Pereira, 1953 )
, ♂, Rio de Janeiro, Restinga da Marambaia (CEMT). A . Parameres lateral view. B . Parameres dorsal view. C . Internal sac ventral view. D . Internal sac dorsal view. Abbreviations: see Material and methods.

subSubSection.paragraph: This species was described by Pereira (1953) in the same publication as the description of the subgenus, for which the author simultaneously designated it as the type species.
